title: Alistair Brownlee on tea drinking, triathlon, and Tokyo 2020
description:
British triathlete and double Olympic champion Alistair Brownlee is usually very busy. With all competition paused, he found time to join the podcast for a look back on an incredible career and his epic moment of brotherly love. Plus, how to make the perfect cup of tea.

For more episodes go to olympicchannel.com/podcast
